```{r setup, include=FALSE}
install_load <- function (package1, ...){   
   packages <- c(package1, ...)
   for(package in packages){
       if(package %in% rownames(installed.packages())){
         do.call('library', list(package))
       }
       else{
          install.packages(package)
          do.call("library", list(package))
       }
   } 
}

install_load("knitr","showtext","remotes")

opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("./"))

font_add_google("Lato", "lato")
showtext_auto()
```

```{r}
library(rlb)
```

```{r}
data(mtcars)

y <- mtcars$mpg
x1 <- mtcars$disp
x2 <- mtcars$hp
x3 <- mtcars$wt
```

```{r}
model_rlb <- RLB(y = y, x1, x2, x3)
class(model_rlb)
```

```{r}
summary(model_rlb)
```

```{r}
koefisien_model <- koef.reg(model_rlb)
print(koefisien_model)
```

```{r}
plot(model_rlb)
```

```{r}
residual_model <- residuals(model_rlb)
print(head(residual_model))
```

```{r}
respon_model <- respons(model_rlb)
print(head(respon_model))
```

```{r}
penjelas_model <- penjelas(model_rlb)
print(head(penjelas_model))
```
